name: The Directed
description: Go around dangerous traps, solve riddles. There is only one way. Can you find it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x32 Processor: Any Dual-core 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel Core i3-530 3Ghz or AMD FX-4000 series Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550Ti or AMD Radeon HD7770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
